questions.question: The gross receipts from the sale of $t$ tickets, at $17 per ticket, total $16,660.

A box contains 20 marbles all of which are solid colored; 5 of the marbles are green and 10 of the marbles are fed
questions.first: The probability that a marble selected at random form the box will be green
questions.second: The probability that a marble selected at random from the box will be neither red now green

questions.question: The cost $c$ of an order of $n$ special envelopes is given by $c=(0.50)+15$

questions.question: The average (arithmetic mean) of 7, 9, and $x$ is greater than 9.

parent:
The top and bottom of each bar indicate, respectively,
the highest and lowest daily number of shirts sold during 
the month. The heavy line across each bar indicates the
average (arithmetic mean) number of shirts sold per day
during the month.
